description: This file defines Vue.js components using LightningJS library for a Notes application UI. It includes a 'NoteListItem' component for individual notes and a 'NoteList' component managing and displaying a list of notes, allowing creation, selection, and deletion of notes.

classes.name: NoteListItem
classes.description: A LightningJS component responsible for rendering a single note item in the list, handling focus, selection, deletion, and display of note metadata.

methods.name: _renderNote
methods.description: Private method to update the note display elements with current note data.

methods.name: refresh
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches the list of notes from dataProvider and updates the list display, highlighting the selected note.

methods.name: _moveFocus
methods.description: Private method to move keyboard focus up or down within the list based on direction input.
